name: Ragdoll, Open Up! [EARLY BETA/ALPHA]
description:
You are a floppy sole FBI officer with the mission of taking down the illegal robotics production. You may loose blood, limbs or even lives but you will do what you can to take down these forces of evil!

This is in development and the current public build is nowhere near the final result, just a simple concept of the main character and some aspects. May be buggy and the text on screen is pretty small for some reason
